## EthersRmmConnection interface

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Provides information on connection to Rmm protocol.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface EthersRmmConnection 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [addresses](./rmm-ethers.ethersrmmconnection.addresses.md) | Record&lt;string, string&gt; | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Mapping of addresses to their names. |
|  [chainId](./rmm-ethers.ethersrmmconnection.chainid.md) | number | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Connected chainId. |
|  [deploymentDate](./rmm-ethers.ethersrmmconnection.deploymentdate.md) | Date | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Date of Rmm protocol contracts deployment. |
|  [provider](./rmm-ethers.ethersrmmconnection.provider.md) | [EthersProvider](./rmm-ethers.ethersprovider.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Ethers provider to connect to the network. |
|  [signer](./rmm-ethers.ethersrmmconnection.signer.md) | [EthersSigner](./rmm-ethers.etherssigner.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Ethers Signer to send transactions to the network. |
|  [startBlock](./rmm-ethers.ethersrmmconnection.startblock.md) | number | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Block of contract deployments. |
